sentence.Network_en: He's a Catholic convert, and rather oppressively more papist than the Pope.
sentence.Network_cn: 他皈依了天主教, 而且比教皇还要虔诚,叫人难以忍受.

sentence.Network_en: You're mistaken if you imagine it to be oppressively hot.
sentence.Network_cn: 要是你想当然地认为这里热得要命的话,那你就错了.

sentence.Network_en: It was oppressively hot in the office.
sentence.Network_cn: 办公室里热得让人感到压抑.
